name: Dark Mirage
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
As a response to any action outside of your turn, you become invisible and move up to 10 feet horizontally. In your place, a shadow copy of yourself remains. It is an exact copy of you, except that it vanishes if it takes damage.

At the start of your turn, your shadow copy first takes a full turn under your control, then vanishes. You then become visible and take your turn normally.
